cn.crowdos.kernel.constraint

类 TemporalPoint

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TemporalPoint(String timePoint, long shift)
      The TemporalPoint function takes a time point and a shift value as input, and returns the startTime and endTime of the temporal window.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TemporalPoint

        public TemporalPoint(String timePoint,
                     long shift)
        The TemporalPoint function takes a time point and a shift value as input, and returns the startTime and endTime of the temporal window.
        参数:
        timePoint - Set the start time and end time of the temporal point object
        shift - Determine the start and end times of a temporal point

    • 方法详细资料

      • decomposer

        public Decomposer<Constraint> decomposer()
        The decomposer function is used to split a constraint into smaller constraints. This is useful for two reasons: 1) It allows the solver to solve problems that are too large for it to handle in one go. 2) It allows the solver to use heuristics that require sub-constraints of a certain type, e.g., TemporalPoint constraints.
        指定者:
        decomposer 在接口中 Decomposable<Constraint>
        返回:
        A Decomposer

      • satisfy

        public boolean satisfy(Condition condition)
        The satisfy function checks if the given condition is a Date object, and if so, it converts that date to a LocalTime object. It then checks whether the time of day represented by that LocalTime is between startTime and endTime (inclusive).
        指定者:
        satisfy 在接口中 Constraint
        参数:
        condition - Check if the condition is satisfied
        返回:
        True if the condition is an instance of date and the local time of that date is equal to starttime or between starttime and endtime

      • getConditionClass

        public Class<? extends Condition> getConditionClass()
        get the condition class Object
        指定者:
        getConditionClass 在接口中 Constraint
        返回:
        The class of the condition that is used to evaluate the rule

      • description

        public String description()
        The description function returns a string that describes the object.
        指定者:
        description 在接口中 Constraint
        返回:
        A string representation of the object

      • toString

        public String toString()
        The toString function is used to print out the contents of a TemporalPoint object.
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 Object
        返回:
        A string object that contains the values of the shift, starttime and endtime variables
